articles.title: 'More the merrier': Asia tourist hubs ready for China influx - The Straits Times
articles.description:
From Sunday, travellers arriving back in China will no longer need to quarantine.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
TOKYO - In Tokyos Asakusa tourist district, caricaturist Masashi Higashitani is dusting off his Chinese as he prepares for an influx of travellers after Beijing ends inbound quarantine rules.
We use… [+1528 chars]

articles.title: With few entry tests, Southeast Asia may gain most from China's travel revival - Reuters
articles.description: Southeast Asia's tourist economies are set to be leading beneficiaries of China's scrapping of travel bans as they have steered clear of the COVID-19 tests before entry that Europe, Japan and the United States have imposed on Chinese visitors.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Jan 6 (Reuters) - Southeast Asia's tourist economies are set to be leading beneficiaries of China's scrapping of travel bans as they have steered clear of the COVID-19 tests before entry t… [+4002 chars]

articles.title: 'English is my mother tongue': Dee Hsu's daughter draws ire of Weibo netizens after controversial statement - AsiaOne
articles.description: When of Chinese descent, speak as the Chinese do? Lily Hsu, daughter of Taiwanese host Dee Hsu, found herself under fire from Weibo netizens when a response from a Q&A session she did was shared on the social media platform. According to a screengrab of her I…
articles.content:
